observation.output:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /tmp/tmpvq5i4eh4/astropy/pyproject.toml:
     1	[build-system]
     2	requires = ["setuptools",
     3	            "setuptools_scm>=6.2",
     4	            "wheel",
     5	            "cython==0.29.30",
     6	            "oldest-supported-numpy",
     7	            "extension-helpers"]
     8	build-backend = 'setuptools.build_meta'
     9	
    10	[tool.setuptools_scm]
    11	write_to = "astropy/_version.py"
    12	
    13	[tool.astropy-bot]
    14	    [tool.astropy-bot.autolabel]
    15	        # Comment this out to re-enable but then labeler Action needs to be disabled.
    16	        enabled = false
    17	
    18	    [tool.astropy-bot.changelog_checker]
    19	        enabled = false
    20	
    21	[tool.cibuildwheel]
    22	# We disable testing for the following wheels:
    23	# - MacOS X ARM (no native hardware, tests are skipped anyway, this avoids a warning)
    24	# - Linux AArch64 (no native hardware, tests take too long)
    25	# - MuslLinux (tests hang non-deterministically)
    26	test-skip = "*-macosx_arm64 *-manylinux_aarch64 *-musllinux_x86_64"
    27	
    28	[[tool.cibuildwheel.overrides]]
    29	# Python 3.11 and later is not available in manylinux2010 so we only
    30	# set this for Python<=3.10.
    31	select = "cp3{8,9,10}-*"
    32	manylinux-x86_64-image = "manylinux2010"
    33	
    34	[tool.cibuildwheel.macos]
    35	archs = ["x86_64", "arm64"]
    36	
    37	[tool.cibuildwheel.linux]
    38	archs = ["auto", "aarch64"]
    39	
    40	[tool.black]
    41	line-length = 88
    42	force-exclude = '''
    43	^/(
    44	  (
    45	    # Directories to always exclude (.gitignore is always excluded)
    46	      examples
    47	    | docs/wcs/examples
    48	    | docs/nddata/examples
    49	    | cextern
    50	    | astropy/extern
